bill_title: refer the question of the sale of the cement plant to a vote of the electors.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to refer the question of the sale of the cement plant to a vote of the electors. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That the following Act be enacted by the South Dakota Legislative Assembly and referred to the vote of the electors of the state at a special election to be held April 3, 2001, for their approval: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for the sale of the cement plant. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The South Dakota State Cement Plant Commission may sell the cement plant, its assets, properties, and facilities. 450 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
